full_text: Thank you Vortex for all you did for us. 🙏 Good luck with your new adventures!! I will keep following you😎 https://t.co/cE0WqksWpW

localize.full_text: 谢谢Vortex为我们所做的一切。🙏祝你的新冒险好运！！我会一直跟着你的https://t.co/cE0WqksWpW😎
localize.quoted_status_full_text:
1/公告：我现在把大部分时间都花在我的新音乐项目上了

在连续两年多的时间里，我每天都在CoinDesk评论上评论比特币

在那之后的5年多时间里，我每天都在推特和RT上谈论比特币

我做这一切都没有想过奖励/补偿。

quoted_status.full_text:
1/Announcement: I'm now devoting most of my time to my new music project

For 2+ yrs straight I commented on bitcoin every day on coindesk comments

For 5+ yrs straight after that I tweeted and RT'd about bitcoin every day

I did all this with no thought of reward/compensation
